Pre-Game Insights: West Indies Head Coach, Daren Sammy, expressed excitement about the matches and the atmosphere at Broward County Stadium.
Stacy Ritter, President and CEO of Visit Lauderdale, highlighted the pride in hosting the tournament and showcasing the stadium.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The matches are part of the 4th and 5th Kuhl Stylish Fans T20I Series, powered by Black and White.
The series is significant for growing cricket awareness in the USA, especially among the Caribbean diaspora and Indian fans.
